nav.description1: Hi, I'm {{firstName}} ðŸ‘‹ I love building things that make an impact! With {{yearsExperience}}+ years in software engineering and a postgraduate degree in Distributed Systems, I specialize in designing scalable, efficient, and maintainable systems.
